item.title: Azure Credentials
item.description: Azure Credential Before You Begin You need to have tenant ID, subscription ID, client ID and client secret values Tenant ID: From the Portal, if you click on the Help icon in the upper right and then choose Show Diagnostics you can find the tenant id in the diagnostic JSON. You can also find TenantID from Portal -> Azure Active Directory -> Proparties -> Directory ID Subscriotion ID From the Portal, if you click on the Help icon in the upper right and then choose Show Diagnostics you can find the subscription id in the diagnostic JSON.
